author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: نيا او را از مالک الوری منع ننمود غفلت ناس بمقامی رسيده که از خسف مدينه و نسف جبل و شقّ ارض آگاه نشده و نميشوند اشارات و علامات کتب ظاهر و در هر حين صيحه مرتفع معذلک جميع از خمر غفلت مدهوشند
translation: So blind hath become the human heart that neither the disruption of the city, nor the reduction of the mountain in dust, nor even the cleaving of the earth, can shake off its torpor. The allusions made in the Scriptures have been unfolded, and the signs recorded therein have been revealed, and the prophetic cry is continually being raised. And yet all, except such as God was pleased to guide, are bewildered in the drunkenness of their heedlessness!
